title: Microsoft Teams: Customization for Watermark (Premium)
description:
Teams meeting organizers now have the
flexibility to choose between a Single watermark or a repeated watermark. The
Single watermark will display the viewer's email on top of the shared content
and/or video feed in a clean and unobtrusive manner. When the Single watermark
option is enabled via Meeting options, the watermark will be enforced for all
meeting attendees.
